GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles without their body texts sorted in descending date order

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for article selected by :article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to article selected by article_id and serves posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: changes votes on selected article by amount in {inc_votes:[amount]} this can be a positive or negative integer - then servers updated article object.
